column2: Kaanch ki unchaai agar dakshin-pashchimi disha ki or se badhi hui ho to ise vastu vikar mana jata hai. Ye aarthik haniyo ka dhyotak hai.
Shayankaksha ke darwaze jeewan me sambhawnaon ko darshate hain. Ye hamesha samkon ki tarh khulne chahiye taki sakaratmak urza andar aa sake.
Cash box ya drawer me kaanch chipkana sakaratmak urza utpann karta hai. Cash drawer ko hamesha dakshin ya paschimi deewaro par hona chahiye.
Dakshin-poorvi disha me shauchalaya ka hona aarthik drishti se hanikarak hai. Shauchalaya me paudhe rakhne se nakaratmak urza kam hoti hai.
Apki colony ka main gate dakshin-paschimi disha ki taraf nahi hona chahiye. Tatha iske samne badi imaratein ya T-junction nahi hone chahiye.
Apne flats ke liye plot hamesha niyamit aakar ka hi chune. Aniyamit aakar ke plots nakaratmak urza ko badhawa dete hain.
Apne ghar ke kono ko kabhi bhi ganda ya bhara hua na rakhein. Unhe hamesha swachch rakhein tatha urza ko sabhi kono me failne de.
Almirah ya ghar ke kisi bhi darwaze ko kholte samay kisi bhi prakar ki dhwani se bachein. Ye ghar me aane wale dhan ko rokta hai.
Dakshin disha ki tulna mein uttar ke iatarf jyada failaw hona ghar me sakaratmak urza lata hai aur aarthik sthiti majboot banata hai.
Seedhiyo ke niche kooda-karkat rakhna Vastu Vikar mana jata hai. Sath hi unke neeche jhadu ya joote rakhne se bhi bachein.
Uttar Uttar-purvi tatha purvi dishaein kaafii pawitra maani jaati hain. Inke neeche jhadu ya joote rakhne se bhi bachein.
Uttar disha bhagwan Kuber ka sthaan mana jata hai. Islie ise hamesha ujjwal rakhna chahiye. Ise sada dakshin se niche hona chahiye.
Shaam ke samay ghar ke sabhi lights ko on karna chahiye. Aisa karne se susti chinta tatha ghar ke sankat door hote hain.
Agar apka retail shop ya ek showroom hai to kaafi ujjwal roshni sakaratmak vatavaran bana sakti hai. Yah vyapar ke liye labhdayak hai.
Purvi disha ki taraf khula hona acha mana jata hai. Toilet/ Bathroom me dakshin ki taraf khidki rakhne se nakaratmak urza ka naash hota hai.
